thread.title_full: Julie's Greenroom Netflix Teaser | POPSUGAR Entertainment

author: Monica Sisavat
title: Julie's Greenroom Netflix Teaser Entertainment
text:
Raise the curtains, Julie Andrews is here! Join Julie as she introduces kids to the magical world of the performing arts. Julie's Greenroom is now streaming, only on Netflix.
Posted by Netflix on Friday, March 17, 2017
Julie Andrews's new show, Julie's Greenroom , premiered on Netflix on Friday, and the streaming giant has given us another look at what to expect. Created by Andrews, her daughter, Emma Walton Hamilton, and Judy Rothman Rofe, the children's series sets out to teach children and parents the importance of the arts. Andrews runs a performing arts workshop for kids in a theater built by her father, and guest stars include Alec Baldwin, Joshua Bell, Tituss Burgess, Carol Burnett, Josh Groban, Ellie Kemper, and Idina Menzel. Check out the teaser above!
